text: Thór Vilhjálmsson (1930-2015) was an Icelandic jurist who served as judge and president of the Court of Justice of the European Free Trade Association States. Prior to his tenure on the EFTA Court, he served as a judge of the European Court of Human Rights, as an associate justice of the Supreme Court of Iceland, and as president of the Association of Icelandic Lawyers. ==References== * Category:1930 births Category:2015 deaths Category:Icelandic judges Category:People from Reykjavík
title: Thór Vilhjálmsson (jurist)
